lessons.japanese: だれがこの封筒を破って開けたのか。
lessons.indonesian: Who has torn the envelope open?

lessons.japanese: 封筒には切手を貼りましたか？
lessons.indonesian: Did you put a stamp on the envelope?

lessons.japanese: この封筒に住所・氏名を書きなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Write your name and address on this envelope.

lessons.japanese: この紙は大きすぎて封筒に入らない。
lessons.indonesian: The paper is too big for the envelope.

lessons.japanese: 履歴書はこの封筒に入れて人事部に提出して下さい。
lessons.indonesian: Enclose your resume in this envelope and submit it to the personnel department.

lessons.japanese: 封筒の裏に彼の住所を書いてしまった。
lessons.indonesian: I've written his address on the back of the envelope.

lessons.japanese: 封筒に切手を貼りなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Stick a stamp on the envelope.

lessons.japanese: 封筒に切手をはらなければならない。
lessons.indonesian: I have to put a stamp on the envelope.

lessons.japanese: 封筒に６０円の切手を貼ってくれますか。
lessons.indonesian: Will you please stick a 60-yen stamp on the envelope?

lessons.japanese: 封筒にもう１枚切手をはりなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Stick another stamp on the envelope.

lessons.japanese: 秘書は手紙を封筒の中に差し込んだ。
lessons.indonesian: The secretary inserted the letter in the envelope.

lessons.japanese: 彼は封筒を破って開けた。
